body_html: You can try omitting magma (pytorch will be compiled w/o magma support, so some operations won't be available) and replacing mkl with openblas conda package: https://anaconda.org/anaconda/openblas.
body_text: You can try omitting magma (pytorch will be compiled w/o magma support, so some operations won't be available) and replacing mkl with openblas conda package: https://anaconda.org/anaconda/openblas.
body: You can try omitting magma (pytorch will be compiled w/o magma support, so some operations won't be available) and replacing mkl with openblas conda package: https://anaconda.org/anaconda/openblas.
